description: This procurement notice is for the Department of National Defence. The department has a requirement for the items listed below. The requested delivery date is August 31st, 2023. All documents must be submitted in either English or French.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Reference
* Title: Vehicular Equipment Components
* Reference Number: cb-6343-10164016
* Solicitation Number: W8486-249108/A

## Tender Notice
* Publication Date: 2023-06-14
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-07-31T14:00:00 (expired)
* Amendment Date: 2023-07-31

## Tender Description
The Department of National Defence seeks bids for vehicular equipment components. Please see the attached tender documents for specific requirements and details.

### Tender Items
The tender includes 63 separate items, including:

1. O-Rings (44.6 cm)
2. Gaskets (34.5 cm)
3. Screws (10.3 cm)
4. Hose assemblies (17.3 cm)
5. Wire rope (37.8 cm)

And 55 other items.

### Technical Requirements
Items must meet specific technical requirements, including:

* Material specifications
* Dimensions and tolerances
* Testing and inspection procedures

## Tender Schedule
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-09-22
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-09-22

## Contact Information
* Contact Name: Hector Vargas
* Contact Email: [HECTOR.VARGAS@forces.gc.ca](mailto:HECTOR.VARGAS@forces.gc.ca)
* Contact Phone: (000) 000-0000

## Note
Please submit bids electronically to:
DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca

## Language
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Trade Agreements
* Refer to the tender documents for details on trade agreements.

The following UNSPSC codes are attached:

* Dip tanks (24111806)
* Wire rope (31151505)
* Electrical lugs, plugs, and connectors (39121400)
* Electrical relays and accessories (39122300)
* Hose assemblies (4720)
* Filters (44122106)
* Oil filters and air filters (40161500)
* Tube reducers (46171630)
* Pins or tacks (54101603)
* Safety horns (46171602)
* Vehicle rain and water level sensors (44122106)
* Rings (5331)
* Seals and Gaskets (5330)

## Expiration Date
This notice expired on 2023-07-31.
